item.title: SWN
item.description: score:48 Chances: Southwestern Energy is engaged in the exploration, development, and production of natural gas, oil, and NGLs, which are key components of the energy industry. The renewable energy industry is a trillion-dollar industry and the optimism around renewable energy presents opportunities for Southwestern Energy.
